data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Mascara, Algeria honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mascara, Algeria

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Mascara prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.section_summary: On average, 192 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Mascara, Algeria.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mascara, Algeria to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Mascara, Algeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Belbali people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Mascara, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Mascara, Algeria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Mascara access to a Bible in their own language.
